attributes.title: This app left my goldfish in critical condition!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: You heard me right, this app almost killed my lovely, light of my life, one in a million goldfish, Tammy. I was scrolling through when suddenly a loud alarm went off saying the words ‚ÄúVOTE DONALD TRUMP‚Äù over and over again, full volume! At the time I had my phone hooked up to the biggest speaker I could find because me and Tammy were listening to our favorite song ‚Äú100 hours of complete silence‚Äù and Tammy‚Äôs bowl was on top of the speaker, so when this obnoxious, crude, assault to my ears started blasting, the vibrations started shaking Tammy‚Äôs bowl! And Tammy is a very easily scared fishy, so with the shaking and the noise she went into cardiac arrest! So here I am, with a dying fish, that‚Äôs slowly getting shook off the speaker, and I‚Äôm looking for how to shut if off, THERE. WAS. NO. OFF. BUTTON. so now I‚Äôm crying cause Tammy‚Äôs bowl is about to fall off the speaker and shatter everywhere. In my panic I closed the app- it continues, I turned off my phone, it continues, I shut my phone completely off, and it continues! I can‚Äôt hear anymore and the only way I know it‚Äôs still playing is Tammy has just been jiggled off the speaker and her bowl has exploded all over the floor! But it doesn‚Äôt stop there, I still need to get this speaker off because the speaker is now rattling it‚Äôs way forward to crush Tammy! Finally, with my ears bleeding, I unplug the speaker. It‚Äôs still blasting from my phone but at least Tammy is safe. I scooped up Tammy, gave her CPR, and she is now recovering in a coffee mug. I never did figure out how to shut off the alarm though, so I ended up smashing my phone to smithereens with a hammer. SO DO NOT BUY THIS APP, IT WILL ENDANGER YOUR FAMILY AND LOVED ONES! TODAY TRUMP HAS LOST A FAITHFUL SUPPORTER BECAUSE HIS APP ALMOST GOT THE LAST OF MY FAMILY KILLED!!!
